title: Our custom logic to validate system NCCL installations is broken
body_html:
We have some logic, called from setup.py, that chooses a system NCCL installation with some care. However, since THD and C10D have been moved into cmake, they have been entirely disregarding this logic and just calling FindPackage.

see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/setup_helpers/nccl.py#L57-L69
for the custom logic that's being ignored.

see #13257 for a related task that we don't have any tests for this functionality
